it.polimi.hegira.queue

Class TaskQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.hegira.queue.TaskQueue

  • public class TaskQueue
extends Object
    Task queue used by: 1. the SRC to write Metamodel entities; 2. the TWC to read Metamodel entities;
    Author:
    Marco Scavuzzo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TaskQueue(String mode, int threads, String queueAddress)
      Creates a task queue between the SRC and the TWC.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TaskQueue

        public TaskQueue(String mode,
         int threads,
         String queueAddress)
          throws QueueException
        Creates a task queue between the SRC and the TWC.
        Parameters:
        mode - The component calling it, i.e. SRC or TWC
        threads - The number of threads that will consume from the queue (only for the TWC).
        queueAddress - The address where the RabbitMQ broker is deployed. Default: localhost
        Throws:
        QueueException - If a connection cannot be established.

    • Method Detail

      • publish

        public void publish(byte[] message)
             throws QueueException
        Publishes a message in the task queue
        Parameters:
        message - The message to be published
        Throws:
        QueueException - if an error is encountered

      • sendNack

        public void sendNack(com.rabbitmq.client.QueueingConsumer.Delivery delivery)
              throws QueueException
        In case a message cannot be processed properly a negative acknowledgment must be sent.
        Parameters:
        delivery - The message that was not processed.
        Throws:
        QueueException

      • getMessageCount

        public int getMessageCount(String queue_name)
        Returns an approximation of the messages present in the queue. NB. Sometimes the count may be 0.
        Parameters:
        queue_name - The name of the queue to query.
        Returns:
        The number of messages in the queue.

      • getConsumer

        public com.rabbitmq.client.QueueingConsumer getConsumer()
        Gets the task queue consumer.
        Returns:
        The Queuing consumer.

      • getDefaultTaskQueueName

        public static String getDefaultTaskQueueName()

      • slowDownProduction

        public void slowDownProduction()
        When called, determines if the SRC produces too fast for the TWC which consumes. If it is the case, it slows down the production. Should be used only for non-partitioned migration.

      • purgeQueue

        public boolean purgeQueue()
                   throws IOException,
                          com.rabbitmq.client.ShutdownSignalException,
                          com.rabbitmq.client.ConsumerCancelledException,
                          InterruptedException,
                          QueueException
        Purges the task queue.
        Returns:
        true if purged; false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException
        com.rabbitmq.client.ShutdownSignalException
        com.rabbitmq.client.ConsumerCancelledException
        InterruptedException
        QueueException
